sounds: Show me how good you are without some rolled newspaper!
name: Hot Dog
strategy: This monster is kind of harmless, and its wave attack is useful to damage other monsters, so try killing it last. Since its wave is its strongest attack, try to stay diagonal. Usually found with [[Doom Deer]] and [[Vampire Pig]]s. Try to make it face the Deer and vice-versa and it'll damage both monsters and make your job a lot easier.
